response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value to you at $15,000, I propose an offer to acquire it from me at a strategic price of $12,000. This offer not only secures your interest but also maximizes my earnings, aligning with our mutual goals. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
